thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SandRidge Energy Q4 Loss Per Share $0.54

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SandRidge Energy Q4 Loss Per Share $0.54
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Sandridge Energy Inc:
* SANDRIDGE ENERGY, INC. REPORTS FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR OF 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.34 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.54 * ‍OIL PRODUCTION INCREASE OF 73 MBO OR 8% IN Q4 2017 OVER Q3 2017​
* ‍ PRODUCTION TOTALED 3.5 MMBOE FOR Q4​ * SEES ‍ 2018 TOTAL PRODUCTION 11.3 MMBOE - 11.9 MMBOE​
* ‍2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE GUIDANCE RANGE IS $180 MILLION - $190 MILLION​
* ‍ FOR 2018, 86 PERCENT OF COMPANY‘S EXPECTED LIQUIDS PRODUCTION IS HEDGED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
